title: {{r-r-w distribution|Animatable Corpses}}
description:
Ooooh, Spoopy!

Bring your fallen companions back to life, or make new friends in unconventional ways, but at what cost??

Entry for the 2025 Caves of Qud Modding Jam: reanimated Monster Mash
